mapper.select: select ap.PERMISSION_NAME as PERMISSION_NAME from APS_PERMISSION_ROLE_REL apr left join APS_ROLE ar1 on apr.ROLE_ID = ar1.ROLE_ID left join APS_PERMISSION ap1 on apr.PERMISSION_ID = ap.PERMISSION_ID where apr.ROLE_ID in (select ar.ROLE_ID as ROLE_ID from APS_USER_ROLE_REL aur left join APS_USER au on aur.USER_ID = au.USER_ID left join APS_ROLE ar on aur.ROLE_ID = ar.ROLE_ID where au.USER_ACCOUNT = #{account})

select ap.PERMISSION_CODE as PERMISSION_CODE from APS_PERMISSION_ROLE_REL apr left join APS_ROLE ar1 on apr.ROLE_ID = ar1.ROLE_ID left join APS_PERMISSION ap1 on apr.PERMISSION_ID = ap.PERMISSION_ID where apr.ROLE_ID in (select ar.ROLE_ID as ROLE_ID from APS_USER_ROLE_REL aur left join APS_USER au on aur.USER_ID = au.USER_ID left join APS_ROLE ar on aur.ROLE_ID = ar.ROLE_ID where au.USER_ACCOUNT = #{account})
